content.text:
# H&M Design Award

The H&M Design Award is an design prize for fashion graduates. The prize was established in 2012 to support young designers with starting careers in fashion. The prize is awarded every year by Hennes & Mauritz AB (H&M), a Swedish multinational clothing-retail company. This prize was not awarded in 2021 or 2022.
